definition: to peep/to peek/to act as voyeur
to peep at/to spy on/to peek
to pry into or spy on/to snoop/to peep/to poke one's nose into/to peer/to get a glimpse of
to look at sth through a bamboo tube/to have a restricted view
lit. to see a leopard through a narrow tube (idiom); fig. to miss the big picture
to spy upon/to lie in wait for (an opportunity)
lit. see one spot on a leopard (idiom); fig. a restricted view
to infer easily/to guess at a glance/to get a clue
lit. not even peek at the garden/fig. to be absorbed in one's studies (idiom)
lit. to see one spot on a leopard/fig. a restricted view

sentences.english: At the same time, I found some interesting trends related to the technological aspects of Microsoft-related development.
sentences.chinese: 同時，我又窺到有關微軟技術發展的一些有趣的趨勢。

sentences.english: The show has drawn much scorn regarding its voyeuristic nature.
sentences.chinese: 這一節目由於其窺陰性而招致了極大的蔑視。

sentences.english: None of this criticism is wrong, but it is hardly a rounded picture.
sentences.chinese: 批評無一不實，但難窺其全貌。

sentences.english: From loyalty and forgiveness, we can directly gain a glimpse of the Confucian essence.
sentences.chinese: 從“忠恕”着眼，可直窺孔子仁學的堂奧。

sentences.english: Most writers are voyeurs of a kind.
sentences.chinese: 大部份作家都屬某一種類型的窺祕者。

sentences.english: This set will show you a glimpse on the beautiful works of bokeh photography .
sentences.chinese: 這一組圖將讓你一窺散景攝影的出色作品。

sentences.english: For a very private person, weddings feel like a lavish exercise in voyeurism.
sentences.chinese: 對於注重隱私的人，婚禮就像是一場盛大的窺陰演習。

sentences.english: We only had the bus and guide for three hours, so were taking a panoramic view of Rome.
sentences.chinese: 我們只有這班公車及三個小時的導覽來一窺羅馬全景。

sentences.english: Study of engine endoscopic system based on wavelet transformation and stereo vision.
sentences.chinese: 基於小波變換和立體視覺的發動機內窺研究。

sentences.english: You may know by a handful the whole sack.
sentences.chinese: 抓一把而知全袋，窺一斑以見全豹。

sentences.english: The invention provides an endoscopic recorder which belongs to the electronic equipment field.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供一種內窺記錄儀，屬於電子設備領域。

definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
